mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (rno, m_id, replytext, replyer, rating) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{m_id}, #{replytext}, #{replyer},#{rating})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_reply where m_id = #{m_id} order by rno desc
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set replytext = #{replytext}, updatedate = sysdate, rating=#{rating} where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno,m_id,replytext,replyer,regdate,updatedate, rating from (select rownum rn, rno, m_id,replytext,replyer, rating, regdate,updatedate from tbl_reply where m_id = #{m_id} ) where rn < ((select count(*) from tbl_reply)-((#{cri.page}-1) * #{cri.perPageNum})) and rn >= ((select count(*) from tbl_reply)-(#{cri.page} * #{cri.perPageNum})) order by rno desc
select count(rno) from tbl_reply where m_id = #{m_id}
select m_id from tbl_reply where rno=#{rno}
